# Git Docs

# Remove a file/folder cache from git

For single file:

git rm --cached mylogfile.log

For single directory:

git rm --cached -r mydirectory

# Remove a single file from specific commit

In order to delete a specific file from any previuos commit you should follow these steps:

git checkout <commit_id>
git reset --soft HEAD^
git rm --cached <file-name>
git commit -m "<your_message>"
git checkout master

WARNING

This is only for local git repo, if you want to delete from remote repo also, you should deal with conflictions. For now, I don't know how to do it.
